id: Airbnb - Property Rental Website - Notion Template

description: Thinking of Renting Out Your Property? Not Sure How to Create a Website?No worries! Simply duplicate this template, customize the content, and voilà—you’ll have your business website up and running in minutes!Features: Clean, simple, and functional site built in Notion Easily customizable with no coding skills required Admin page for managing contact & room booking responses Menus included - Home, Gallery, Pricing, Testimonials and Contact Advantages: Quick setup with pre-designed pages User
features: Clean, simple, and functional site built in Notion; Easily customizable with no coding skills required; Admin page for managing contact & room booking responses; Menus included - Home, Gallery, Pricing, Testimonials and Contact; Quick setup with pre-designed pages; User-friendly and intuitive—perfect for first-time website creators; Save time and money—no need for a developer; Fully in your control, with easy updates and customizations
